notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Daily dengue fever cases and patient information from 2008-2016 in Guangdong Province were obtained from the China National Notifiable Infectious Disease Reporting Information System (NNDS) ( http://www.chinacdc.cn/). Daily meteorological data were obtained from the China Integrated Meteorological Information Sharing System ( http://data.cma.cn/). Population data were obtained from the Statistics Bureau of Guangdong Province ( http://www.gdstats.gov.cn/).
